channel.title: Help with my shops pl0x! im using allstarscape server source
channel.description:
Here is my problem i have no errors or any thing but when i click trade or talk it does nothing here are my client.java and shops.cfg i also spawned him.
client.java
[Code]: } else if (NPCID == 521) { // randomshop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71;[/code] shops.CFG
[Code]: shop = 71 Modshop 2 2 4272 100 773[/code] 100i am using allstarscape serversource and in shops.cfg i put the shops at the end of the list before [ENDOFSHOPSLIST] and i already spawned shops do i have to add in npchandler????? or what please help this is the 6th time i posted this im getting mad lol. and if you wanna see what i mean it wont work c ome and see my ip is damnright.no-ip.biz i am not advertising i am just trying to help you guys understand better please do.
